RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: GrooveTool
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: A tool for manipulating timing data in order to create 'groove' or 'swing' patterns. Moving each slider will move the note(s) on the corresponding line back or forward in time. 'Cycle length' controls the number of lines after which the groove pattern repeats itself, which equals the number of sliders. 'Range' controls the maximum amount (in lines) that a note will be moved.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Nisan Mol [nisanmol@gmail.com]
